DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine two dose level indinavir combine two nucleoside analogue reverse transcriptase inhibitor ( NRTIs ) effect plasma viral load ( level HIV blood ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Two Dose Levels Indinavir Combined With Two Nucleoside Analogue Reverse Transcriptase Inhibitors ( NRTIs ) HIV-Infected Patients
DOC.detailed_description: In open-label study 350 seropositive HIV-1 men woman first stratify accord baseline plasma viral RNA ( less 400 copies/mL v negative plasma viral RNA result ) randomize one two arm : Arm 1 : Indinavir ( 800 mg , q8h ) plus two pre-existing NRTIs . Arm 2 : Indinavir ( 1,200 mg , q12h ) plus two pre-existing NRTIs . Plasma viral RNA measure every 4 week duration 24-week study .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : Documented HIV1 seropositive status . CD4 count great 100 cells/mm3 . Parental consent patient 18 .
